name: ~NEW~ 100happee Baseball v1.12 Part 4
description:
If you want to know how to play, click the "?" button. 

Thank Mario Kart Wii for the music. 

Part 1: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/606537923/

Part 2: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/606621948/

Part 3: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/607277728/

Note to Players: There are some bug fixes that I do not know how to fix.

This is the old beta version for the game I am going to make (or maybe it's already made by now).

Version log:

1.0: Created assets.

1.1: Created base batting engine.

1.2: Made a lot of bug fixes so you can play.

1.3: Made map and walking scratch cat.

1.4: Made bases.

1.5: Made Pico come get you!

1.6: Made play button on main menu.

1.7: Finished main menu and mobile version.

1.8: Added sounds.

1.9: Added ending game feature.

1.10: Added upgrades.

1.11: Made glitches list. If you find any new glitches that is not on that list, report it to me.

1.12: Made reset button.
